favourite.article: Lord Jesus, I love You! I give You the preeminence in what I do!

Hallelujah!! Praise the Lord!! Thank You Lord for washing away all our sins, our cares, and all our strife... Lord Jesus I love You! Thank You for Your recovery! Thank you for our situations and environments we are in!
Praise You Lord You have a purpose! Lord gain Your purpose in me!
But hallelujah! Praise the Lord! Godâ€™s life is now in me!
Praise the Lord for this wonderful Christ. AMEN. AMEN. O Lord, how much I love You.
Yes! Oh Lord Jesus! God's life is now in me and now this life in me is flowing in me as the river of water of life oh Lord Jesus! I love You!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Oh Lord Jesus, I love You! I give You the preeminence in what I do. Oh how I thank You for every situation I've been through, may they be more opportunities to keep gaining You. I choose to be an overcomer. Thank You that You've chosen me to be in such a glorious place, here in the church life, with all the saints so dear. LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU!!!!
O Lord Jesus, I love You more and more each day. I really enjoyed this song. Praise the Lord!!
Amen. We are now one with Him. Praise the LORD that HE is the GOD of purpose. He is now the life-giving Spirit.
Praise the Lord for such a reality! His economy is so glorious!

I really enjoy #3, no matter how bad the situation we are in, we'd turn to the Lord and turn away from our human soul, thinking, concepts. We'd drop all our anxieties and put our trust in the Lord. The more we enjoy the Lord, the more we experience Christ as our RESURRECTION LIFE in us.
Amen, I love this hymn very much, because I enjoy the Lord with this hymn. "Now the church life is so precious with all the saints so dear." Amen for these miracle words!

Praise the Lord for His economy. We are part of it. I am really impressed with this song because it helps me to turn to my mingled spirit and allows me to enjoy the rich supply of the Triune God. Amen.

Lord, we give You the preeminence! You are our first Love!
Excellent job done by the arranger/midi programmer.

This song reminds me that we just need to trust in Him, let Him take care of our worries and needs.
Lord help e trust more and more in You each day.
Lord Jesus! WE love YOU! Add Yourself to US today.
Amen!!! Praise the Lord for His intention, that is to be one with man. He accomplished it through the processes that He had passed through. We are now one with Him in life and in nature.
